ChunkLoader Class Reference

This class loads chunks using a background thread. More...

Detailed Description

This class loads chunks using a background thread.

void ChunkLoader::load ( Chunk *  pChunk,
int  priority = 0 
) [static]

This method loads the empty chunk pChunk (its identifier is set).

This is called from the main thread

Parameters:
pChunk The chunk to load.
priority The priority at which to load. 0 is normal, lower numbers mean that are loaded earlier.

void ChunkLoader::loadNow ( Chunk *  pChunk  )  [static]

This method loads the input chunk immediately in the main thread.
